name: Go Kart Park
description:
Enjoy a day of racing at our Go Kart Park.

Three tracks and 8 go karts (with either manual or automatic transmissions) to choose from. A standard oval lap track, a slick track with tight hairpin turns, and a drag strip.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone 5 displays.

Featured in the movie: "Grand Prix: The Winning Tale" http://amzn.com/B005REEVY0
